#setup: DecimalSupport,NumberIsFloat,PowerFxV1CompatibilityRules

// Number is Decimal (NumberIsFloat disabled)
// Value function uses Decimal

>> 1.0000000000000000000000001
1

// Decimal

>> Decimal("1.0000000000000000000000001")
1.0000000000000000000000001

>> Decimal(1.0000000000000000000000001)
1

>> Decimal(1.0000000000000000000000001) + Decimal(1.0000000000000000000000001)
2

>> Decimal("1.0000000000000000000000001") + Decimal("1.0000000000000000000000001")
2.0000000000000000000000002

>> Decimal(1.0000000000000000000000001) * Decimal(2.0000000000000000000000002)
2

>> Decimal("1.0000000000000000000000001") * Decimal("2.0000000000000000000000002")
2.0000000000000000000000004

>> Decimal("1.0000000000000000000000001%")
0.010000000000000000000000001

>> Decimal(1.0000000000000000000000001%)
0.01

>> Decimal(1.0000000000000000000000001e2)
100

>> Decimal("1,0000000000000000000000001", "Fr-Fr")
1.0000000000000000000000001

>> Decimal(1e50) > 10
Error({Kind:ErrorKind.InvalidArgument})

>> Decimal("1e50") > 10
Error({Kind:ErrorKind.InvalidArgument})

>> Decimal(1e-50)
0

>> (Decimal(1237940039285380274899124224) * Decimal(1073741824)) / Decimal(1180591620717411303424) // powers of two, can be handled exactly in floating point, overflow decimal
Error({Kind:ErrorKind.Numeric})

>> Decimal(340282366920938463463374607431768211456) / Decimal(1267650600228229401496703205376)
Error(Table({Kind:ErrorKind.InvalidArgument},{Kind:ErrorKind.InvalidArgument}))

// Value (should be the same as Float)

>> Value("1.0000000000000000000000001")
1

>> Value(1.0000000000000000000000001)
1

>> Value(1.0000000000000000000000001) + Value(1.0000000000000000000000001)
2

>> Value(1.0000000000000000000000001) * Value(2.0000000000000000000000002)
2

>> Value("1.0000000000000000000000001%")
0.01

>> Value(1.0000000000000000000000001%)
0.01

>> Value(1.0000000000000000000000001e2)
100

>> Value("1,0000000000000000000000001", "Fr-Fr")
1

>> Value("1e50") > 10
true

>> Value(1e-50)
0

>> (Value(1237940039285380274899124224) * Value(1073741824)) / Value(1180591620717411303424) // powers of two, can be handled exactly in floating point, overflow decimal
1125899906842624

>> 340282366920938463463374607431768211456 / 1267650600228229401496703205376
268435456

>> Value(340282366920938463463374607431768211456) / Value(1267650600228229401496703205376)
268435456

// Float

>> Float("1.0000000000000000000000001")
1

>> Float(1.0000000000000000000000001)
1

>> Float(1.0000000000000000000000001) + Float(1.0000000000000000000000001)
2

>> Float(1.0000000000000000000000001) * Float(2.0000000000000000000000002)
2

>> Float("1.0000000000000000000000001%")
0.01

>> Float(1.0000000000000000000000001%)
0.01

>> Float(1.0000000000000000000000001e2)
100

>> Float("1,0000000000000000000000001", "Fr-Fr")
1

>> Float(1e50) > 10
true

>> Float("1e50") > 10
true

>> Float(1e-50)
0

>> (Float(1237940039285380274899124224) * Float(1073741824)) / Float(1180591620717411303424) // powers of two, can be handled exactly in floating point, overflow decimal
1125899906842624

>> Float(340282366920938463463374607431768211456) / Float(1267650600228229401496703205376)
268435456
